research.name: Tool Making
research.description: The creation stone tools: hand axes, hammerstones, and knives all allows more efficient gathering techniques.

research.name: Agriculture
research.description: The cultivation of grains and plants greatly increases yields when compared to gathering wild crops.

research.name: Charcoal
research.description: Raw wood contains a number of volatile compounds and water which reduces overall temperatures and increases overall smoke. By heating the wood without oxygen charcoal can be produced.

research.name: Fishing
research.description: Deep oceans and lakes contain a wealth of food, but requires specialized tools such as harpoons and nets to catch.

research.name: Storytelling
research.description: The telling of stories is more that just entertainment. It was the original way to transfer knowledge between the generations.
